title: Amidst launch of publications, UNESCO, Communication University of China celebrate 10th anniversary of UNESCO Chair ...
text: ( Source : UNESCO - United Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization ) More than 100 experts and scholars in gender and media studies as well as journalism education, along with media practitioners, attended the gathering held
